alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:08AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, south central Crawford, Sebastian and east central Le Flore Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 608 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Midland, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Charleston... Greenwood... Barling... Lavaca... Hackett... Hartford... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Bloomer... Excelsior... Burnville... Jenny Lind... Kibler... Rock Island... Central City... Arkola... Witcherville... Rye Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
